characters.name: Hiro
characters.description:
__Height:__ 168 cm (5'6")
__Classification:__ Parasite
__Affiliation:__ Thirteenth Plantation
__Occupation:__ Stamen
__Partners:__ ~! Zero Two, Naomi (formerly), Ichigo (temporarily), 001 (temporarily), 9'α (temporarily) !~
__FRANXX:__ Strelizia, Delphinium (temporarily), ~! 9 Model (temporarily) !~

Hiro was known as a prodigy Parasite with the codename "016" of Thirteenth Plantation, where he's partnered in a boy-girl pair with Zero Two to pilot a FRANXX called Strelizia.

characters.name: Zero Two
characters.description:
__Height:__ 170 cm (5'7")
__Classification:__ Parasite
__Affiliation:__ APE's Special Forces Unit
__Partner:__ Hiro
__FRANXX:__ Strelizia 

Zero Two is an elite FRANXX pilot who is a member of a race of humans with Klaxosaur blood, and the pistil of the FranXX Strelizia.

characters.name: Ichigo
characters.description:
__Height:__ 152 cm (5’0”)

Ichigo is a former Parasite with the codename "015" of the Thirteenth Plantation, where she was partnered in boy-girl pair with Goro to pilot a FRANXX called Delphinium.

characters.name: Goro
characters.description: Goro pilots the Franxx Delphinium with Ichigo.

characters.name: Miku
characters.description:
Miku is a former Parasite with the codename "390" of the Thirteenth Plantation, where she is partnered in boy-girl pair with [Zorome](https://anilist.co/character/124385/Zorome) to pilot a FRANXX called Argentea.

She is the most assertive and head-strong of the girls and is not afraid to clash with the boys. She is motivated to strive and she shares an attitude almost identical to Zorome’s, which makes them perfectly compatible.

characters.name: Zorome
characters.description:
Zorome is a former Parasite with the codename "666" of the Thirteenth Plantation, where he is partnered in a boy-girl pair with [Miku](https://anilist.co/character/124384/Miku) to pilot a FRANXX called Argentea.

Aside from being the most immature member of the squad, he is the most loyal to the adults and APE, and his long-reaching goal is to become an adult himself. He presents himself as somewhat of a bully and pervert but he is also a dedicated member of the squad and willing to do whatever it takes to help his squadmates.

characters.name: Kokoro
characters.description:
__Height:__ 160 cm (5'3")

Pilots the Franxx Genista with Futoshi.

~!After the partner shuffle, she rides with Mitsuru. Kokoro becomes pregnant with Mitsuru's child later on in the anime.!~

characters.name: Futoshi
characters.description: Pilots the Franxx Genista (ジェニスタ) with Kokoro (ココロ)

characters.name: Ikuno
characters.description:
__Height:__ 169 cm (5'7")

Pilots the Franxx Chlorophytum with Mitsuru.

characters.name: Mitsuru
characters.description:
Mitsuru pilots the FRANXX Chlorophytum with Ikuno, and is part off Plantation 13.

~!Later in the anime, he switches partners with Futoshi, and ends up piloting the FRANXX Genista, along with Kokoro. They fall in love and Kokoro gets pregnant with his child.!~

characters.name: Franxx-hakase
characters.description: Creator of the FRANXX used to fight Klaxosaurs.

characters.name: Nana
characters.description: Parasite administrator of APE Operational Headquarters. ~!She was a FranXX Pilot in the same squadron as Hachi.!~

characters.name: Hachi
characters.description: Commander of Urban Defense Operation of APE Operational Headquarters.

characters.name: Kyouryuu no Hime
alt_names: Zero Zero One (ゼロゼロイチ)
characters.description:
**Classification:** Klaxo Sapiens
**Partner:** N/A (capable of piloting FRANXX without one)
**FRANXX:** Model Saurian, 9 Model (temporarily), Strelizia (temporarily)

A mysterious being that lurks deep inside Earth, accompanied by numerous Klaxosaurs. She's capable of speaking telepathically and seems to have a close bond with a serpentine Klaxosaur named **Nawabari** (縄張).

~!She's the last surviving member of an advanced humanoid race from which the Klaxosaurs evolved, aware of VIRM's true nature and spiteful of humanity due to their ignorance, as well as playing a part in exterminating her kind.!~

~![Zero Two](https://anilist.co/character/124381/Zero-Two) was created from her DNA, which [Dr Franxx](https://anilist.co/character/124851/Dr-Franxx-) extracted from a handful of her hair. She's also the one that bit off his arm, having recognized his key role in developing anti-Klaxosaur weaponry.!~

characters.name: Naomi
characters.description:
Naomi is a former Parasite from the Thirteenth Plantation with the codename "703". She is the former partner of Hiro, who held her back from becoming a pilot due to his inability to pilot FRANXX.
(Source: Franxx Wiki)

characters.name: 9' Alpha
characters.description:
Alpha is a character in DARLING in the FRANXX. He was a Parasite and the official leader of the 9's, a special forces unit that APE directly controls. He was partnered with 9’ζ and piloted a FRANXX called 9 Model. 

Nine Alpha is a rather short young man, his face framed by pale, honey blond hair, his long bangs low above his green eyes. He wears a special Parasite uniform emblazoned with white and gold, instead of the typical gray uniforms that other Parasite squads use. When in his FRANXX, Alpha, along with the others in his squad, sports a red battle suit. Like his fellow stamens, he appears with golden horns that appear to be holographic klaxosaur horns.

characters.name: 9' Delta
characters.description:
9'δ is a Parasite who served in the 9's, a special forces unit that APE directly controls. She is partners with 9'ε and pilots a FRANXX called the 9 Model.

(Source: DARLING in the FRANXX Wiki)

characters.name: 9' Beta
characters.description:
9'β was a Parasite who served in the 9's, a special forces unit that APE directly controls. He was partnered with 9'η and piloted a FRANXX called 9 Model.

(Source: DARLING in the FRANXX Wiki)

characters.name: Shuseki
characters.description:
**Age:** More than 60 million years

He is the chairman of the APE council and by extension all of known humanity. Like a leader, Shuseki speaks in a refined and sophisticated manner, and tends to handle situations in a methodical order.

(Source: DARLING in the FRANXX Wiki)

characters.name: Tarsier
characters.description:
**Age:** Over 60 million

He is a member of the Seven Sages of APE and is secretly a VIRM.
